<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Inscrutable Mask](/Spells.aspx?ID=1061)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 227 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You shroud your form and features in an impenetrable mask of shadow. The mask grants you a +1 status bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) or [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) in areas of [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) or [darkness](/Rules.aspx?ID=409).

---
**Heightened (6th)** The status bonus increases to +2.

**Heightened (9th)** The status bonus increases to +3.
name: Inscrutable Mask
